name: Mosquito Trap Pro
shortDescription: Eco-friendly UV suction trap for indoor use.
longDescription: A high-efficiency mosquito trap using specific UV wave frequencies to attract insects and a powerful silent fan to trap them. No chemicals, safe for kids and pets.

name: AI Cleaner Robot Kit
shortDescription: Smart autonomous floor cleaner with obstacle avoidance.
longDescription: A DIY-friendly yet powerful AI cleaner robot. Uses ultrasonic sensors and custom algorithms to navigate rooms and clean efficiently.

name: Smart Worker Mask
shortDescription: N95 compatible mask with active air filtration and sensors.
longDescription: Designed for industrial workers, this mask features active air intake and a CO2 sensor to alert users when air quality is low.

name: Electric Battery Device
shortDescription: Portable high-capacity power bank for field engineering.
longDescription: Rugged power source capable of running microcontrollers and small hardware components for up to 24 hours in the field.

name: Smart Dustbin Kit
shortDescription: Automatic lid opening bin with fill-level alerts.
longDescription: An IoT enabled dustbin that opens automatically when hands are near and sends a mobile notification when it reaches 90% capacity.

name: IoT Smart Door Lock
shortDescription: WiFi enabled deadbolt with remote app access.
longDescription: Replace your standard lock with this IoT solution. Unlock your door from anywhere in the world via the Dominant Mind mobile app.

name: Solar Power Station
shortDescription: Compact solar charging kit for mobile and IoT devices.
longDescription: Harvest clean energy. This kit includes a high-efficiency solar panel and a battery management system for off-grid power.

name: Auto Plant Waterer
shortDescription: Precision irrigation system for indoor plants.
longDescription: Never forget to water your plants. This device monitors soil moisture and provides exactly the right amount of water when needed.

name: Object Avoidance Robot
shortDescription: Basic learning kit for beginner robotics students.
longDescription: The perfect starter kit for students to learn motor control and sensor integration. Includes pre-written code and assembly guide.

name: BT Audio Dev Kit
longDescription: Build your own wireless audio system. This kit includes the amplifier board, speakers, and a modern Bluetooth 5.0 module.
